instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System Settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key and then tap switch to list view . Scroll to 'DEVICE,' then tap Apps . Tap the desired app. Tap Disable . Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System Settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key and then tap switch to list view . Scroll to 'DEVICE,' then tap Apps . Tap the desired app. Tap Enable .
